network

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Network

  • public class Network
extends java.lang.Object
    Managment class for networking
    Author:
    jafi2

      The id of the local player

      the server Null if this is a client

      Updates sent to the clients per second

      • Network

        private Network(int playerID,
                double syncRate)
        initializes Network
        Parameters:
        playerID - the id of the local user, for server always 0
        syncRate - only for server. number of updates sent to clients per second

      • getKeyStates

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getKeyStates(int playerID)
        Returns a HashMap with all known states of keyboard keys for the given player
        Clients may not call this method
        Method must not be called with the local player's id
        Parameters:
        playerID - the id of the player
        Returns:
        the HashMap use GLFW.GLFW_KEY_keyname as key to get GLFW key state

      • getMousePosition

        public Vector getMousePosition(int playerID)
        Returns the last reported mouse position for the given player
        Clients may not call this method
        Method must not be called with the local player's id
        Parameters:
        playerID - the id of the player
        Returns:
        the position of the mouse
